languages.text: {n}Ульфар суеверно делает отгоняющий зло жест.{/n} "Лишь одно спасает эту грязноязыкую вошь: не к добру проливать кровь юродивого. Умственная немощь может на убийцу перепрыгнуть".

{n}Ulfar makes a superstitious gesture to ward off evil.{/n} "Spilling the blood of a harmless fool is a bad omen. The feebleness of mind might spread to the killer. And that is the only thing saving this filthy-tongued louse's life."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар суеверно делает отгоняющий зло жест.{/n} "Лишь одно спасает эту грязноязыкую вошь: не к добру проливать кровь юродивого. Умственная немощь может на убийцу перепрыгнуть".

{n}Ulfar makes a superstitious gesture to ward off evil.{/n} "Spilling the blood of a harmless fool is a bad omen. The feebleness of mind might spread to the killer. And that is the only thing saving this filthy-tongued louse's life."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar hace un gesto supersticioso para alejar el mal.{/n} «Derramar la sangre de un necio inofensivo es de mal agüero. La debilidad de su mente puede extenderse a su asesino. Eso es lo único que protege la vida de este canalla de boca sucia».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a superstitious gesture to ward off evil.{/n} "Spilling the blood of a harmless fool is a bad omen. The feebleness of mind might spread to the killer. And that is the only thing saving this filthy-tongued louse's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar hace un gesto supersticioso para alejar el mal.{/n} «Derramar la sangre de un necio inofensivo es de mal agüero. La debilidad de su mente puede extenderse a su asesino. Eso es lo único que protege la vida de este canalla de boca sucia».

languages.text: {n}乌尔法做了个巫术的手势，用来驱邪。{/n}“若是让人畜无害的白痴流血，便会招致灾祸，因为他孱弱的精神会削弱杀戮者的力量。不过，恐怕也只有杀了他，才能让这只口出狂言的虱子得到救赎。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a superstitious gesture to ward off evil.{/n} "Spilling the blood of a harmless fool is a bad omen. The feebleness of mind might spread to the killer. And that is the only thing saving this filthy-tongued louse's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法做了个巫术的手势，用来驱邪。{/n}“若是让人畜无害的白痴流血，便会招致灾祸，因为他孱弱的精神会削弱杀戮者的力量。不过，恐怕也只有杀了他，才能让这只口出狂言的虱子得到救赎。”

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは迷信的な仕草で魔除けを結ぶ。{/n}「無害な愚か者の血を撒き散らすことは悪い兆しだ。心の弱さが殺人者に広がる。そして、それがこの舌の汚いシラミ野郎を救う唯一の方法だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a superstitious gesture to ward off evil.{/n} "Spilling the blood of a harmless fool is a bad omen. The feebleness of mind might spread to the killer. And that is the only thing saving this filthy-tongued louse's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは迷信的な仕草で魔除けを結ぶ。{/n}「無害な愚か者の血を撒き散らすことは悪い兆しだ。心の弱さが殺人者に広がる。そして、それがこの舌の汚いシラミ野郎を救う唯一の方法だ」

languages.text: {n}Ulfar esquisse un geste superstitieux destiné à repousser le mal.{/n} « Verser le sang d'un imbécile inoffensif est de mauvais augure. La faiblesse d'esprit de la victime risque de se propager à son meurtrier. Et c'est bien la seule chose qui me pousse à épargner ce blanc-bec impertinent. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a superstitious gesture to ward off evil.{/n} "Spilling the blood of a harmless fool is a bad omen. The feebleness of mind might spread to the killer. And that is the only thing saving this filthy-tongued louse's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar esquisse un geste superstitieux destiné à repousser le mal.{/n} « Verser le sang d'un imbécile inoffensif est de mauvais augure. La faiblesse d'esprit de la victime risque de se propager à son meurtrier. Et c'est bien la seule chose qui me pousse à épargner ce blanc-bec impertinent. »

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, kötülüğü defetmek için bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Zararsız bir aptalın kanını dökmek kötüye alamettir. Akıl zayıflığı, canını alan kişiye bulaşabilir. Bu pis ağızlı itin hâlâ sağ olmasının tek sebebi budur."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a superstitious gesture to ward off evil.{/n} "Spilling the blood of a harmless fool is a bad omen. The feebleness of mind might spread to the killer. And that is the only thing saving this filthy-tongued louse's life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, kötülüğü defetmek için bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Zararsız bir aptalın kanını dökmek kötüye alamettir. Akıl zayıflığı, canını alan kişiye bulaşabilir. Bu pis ağızlı itin hâlâ sağ olmasının tek sebebi budur."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar macht eine abergläubische Geste, um Böses abzuwehren.{/n} "Das Blut eines harmlosen Narren zu vergießen, ist ein böses Omen. Die Geistesschwäche könnte auf den Mörder übergehen. Und das ist der einzige Grund, warum ich dieses Schandmaul nicht töte."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar makes a superstitious gesture to ward off evil.{/n} "Spilling the blood of a harmless fool is a bad omen. The feebleness of mind might spread to the killer. And that is the only thing saving this filthy-tongued louse's life."
